org.mini2Dx.core

Class Mdx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.Mdx

  • public class Mdx
extends java.lang.Object
    Mini2Dx environment class

    Note: Everything is public static to allow cross-platform reference setting. These variables should not be modified.
